title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The outjar command in ajc creates a .jar file without a MANIFEST.MF file, resulting in an invalid jar file.
OB: When I use ajc and execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar', an output file with a .jar extension is created. However, the generated file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: I expect the outjar command in ajc to create a valid .jar file that includes a MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: To reproduce the issue, execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar' and verify that the generated .jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
